root.name: The Adventures of Fatman: Toxic Revenge
root.description: OverviewDeveloped primarily by one person, Michael Doak, this superhero parody game was one of the earliest Adventure Game Studio games to be sold as a commercial product. The game features a Batman-esque hero named Fatman investigating a chemical plant explosion and facing off against the villain Toxicman. This game has no relation to Tongue of the Fatman or various other "Fatmen" who have appeared in games.The game's visuals and puzzles were done in the style of classic Lucasarts adventure games.
